content: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

content: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.

content: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.

content: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.

content: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.

content: We accept the love we think we deserve.

content: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

content: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.

content: It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

content: The truth is rarely pure and never simple.

content: If I am worth anything later, I am worth something now. For wheat is wheat, even if people think it is a grass in the beginning.

content: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.

content: Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.

content: Life is what happens to us while we are making other plans.

content: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.

content: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.

content: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.

content: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.

content: Never let your sense of morals prevent you from doing what is right.

content: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

content: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.

content: The mind is everything. What you think you become.

content: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

content: Happiness is not something readymade. It comes from your own actions.

content: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

content: If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything.

content: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.

content: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.

content: We are such stuff as dreams are made on, and our little life is rounded with a sleep.

content: The unexamined life is not worth living.

content: When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.

content: There is some good in this world, and it's worth fighting for.

content: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.

content: Perhaps one did not want to be loved so much as to be understood.

content: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.

content: To love another person is to see the face of God.

content: Words can be like X-rays if you use them properly—they'll go through anything. You read and you're pierced.

content: I have learned that to be with those I like is enough.

content: When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
content_id: Ketika kamu menginginkan sesuatu, seluruh alam semesta akan berkonspirasi untuk membantumu mewujudkannya.

content: It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting.

content: People learn, at least when they are young, to accept their own fate.

content: To realize one's destiny is a person's only obligation.

content: Remember that wherever your heart is, there you will find your treasure.

content: The secret of happiness is to see all the marvels of the world, and never to forget the drops of oil on the spoon.

content: Courage is the quality most essential to understanding the Language of the World.
content_id: Keberanian adalah kualitas yang paling penting untuk memahami Bahasa Dunia.

content: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.

content: Everyone seems to have a clear idea of how other people should lead their lives, but none about his or her own.

content: The simple things are also the most extraordinary things, and only the wise can see them.

content: You must understand that love never keeps a man from pursuing his destiny. If he abandons that pursuit, it's because it wasn't true love.
content_id: Kamu harus memahami bahwa cinta tidak pernah menghalangi seseorang untuk mengejar takdirnya. Jika dia meninggalkan pencariannya, itu karena cinta itu bukan cinta yang sejati.

content: Don't give in to your fears. If you do, you won't be able to talk to your heart.
content_id: Jangan menyerah pada ketakutanmu. Jika kamu melakukannya, kamu tidak akan bisa berbicara dengan hatimu.

content: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
content_id: Hanya ada satu hal yang membuat sebuah impian tidak mungkin tercapai: rasa takut akan kegagalan.

content: The world is changed by your example, not by your opinion.
content_id: Dunia ini berubah melalui teladanmu, bukan melalui pendapatmu.

content: People learn, at least when they are young, to accept their own fate.
content_id: Orang-orang belajar, setidaknya ketika mereka masih muda, untuk menerima takdir mereka sendiri.

content: Everything that happens once can never happen again. But everything that happens twice will surely happen a third time.
content_id: Segala sesuatu yang terjadi sekali tidak akan pernah terulang lagi. Tetapi segala sesuatu yang terjadi dua kali pasti akan terjadi untuk ketiga kalinya.

content: The fear of suffering is worse than the suffering itself.
content_id: Ketakutan akan penderitaan lebih buruk daripada penderitaan itu sendiri.

content: No matter what he does, every person on Earth plays a central role in the history of the world. And normally he doesn't know it.
content_id: Tidak peduli apa yang dia lakukan, setiap orang di Bumi memainkan peran penting dalam sejarah dunia. Dan biasanya dia tidak mengetahuinya.

content: The most important part of the treasure you seek is the journey itself.
content_id: Bagian terpenting dari harta yang kamu cari adalah perjalanan itu sendiri.

content: Wisdom cannot be imparted. Wisdom that a wise man attempts to impart always sounds like foolishness to someone else.
content_id: Kebijaksanaan tidak bisa diajarkan. Kebijaksanaan yang coba disampaikan oleh orang bijak akan selalu terdengar seperti kebodohan bagi orang lain.

content: I have had to experience despair, I have had to sink to the greatest mental depths, to thoughts of suicide, in order to experience grace.
content_id: Aku harus mengalami keputusasaan, aku harus tenggelam ke dalam kedalaman mental yang paling dalam, hingga berpikir tentang bunuh diri, untuk bisa mengalami anugerah.

content: You seek too much, and as a result you cannot find.
content_id: Kamu terlalu banyak mencari, dan akibatnya kamu tidak bisa menemukan.

content: The world was beautiful when looked at in this way—without any seeking, so simple, so childlike.
content_id: Dunia tampak indah ketika dilihat dengan cara ini—tanpa pencarian, begitu sederhana, begitu seperti anak-anak.

content: Love can be begged, bought, or received as a gift, but it cannot be stolen.
content_id: Cinta bisa dimohon, dibeli, atau diterima sebagai hadiah, tetapi tidak bisa dicuri.

content: We are not going in circles, we are going upwards. The path is a spiral; we have already climbed many steps.
content_id: Kita tidak berjalan dalam lingkaran, kita sedang naik. Jalannya berbentuk spiral; kita sudah menaiki banyak anak tangga.

content: One must find the source within one's own Self, one must possess it.
content_id: Seseorang harus menemukan sumbernya dalam dirinya sendiri, ia harus memilikinya.

content: I have always believed, and I still believe, that whatever good or bad fortune may come our way we can always give it meaning and transform it into something of value.
content_id: Aku selalu percaya, dan masih percaya, bahwa apapun keberuntungan atau kemalangan yang datang kepada kita, kita selalu bisa memberinya makna dan mengubahnya menjadi sesuatu yang bernilai.

content: Flow with whatever may happen, and let your mind be free: Stay centered by accepting whatever you are doing. This is the ultimate.

content: Once upon a time, I dreamt I was a butterfly... Now I do not know whether I was then a man dreaming I was a butterfly, or whether I am now a butterfly, dreaming I am a man.
